name: Gravity Run (itch) (briefjoe)
description:
You are a soldier who is training to use a new gravity suit in a remote forest.  

This game was made for the Boundless Game Jam 2021.

How To Play

Flip gravity to avoid obstacles. You can flip gravity whenever and however often you want.

Is the game too difficult for you? Enable baby mode to make it easier!

Controls:

There is only one control. Press space to change the direction of gravity. That's it.

Well, you can also press 'P' to pause the game.

This is the first game I've made, so of course, it's probably riddled with bugs.

Feedback is appreciated.
